starkcoder.failfast.fails

Interface IFailerReference

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IFailFast
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AFailFast, FailFast

    public interface IFailerReference
    Failer reference specification. Implement this to manage a reference to a failer.
    Author:
    Keld Oelykke

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IFailer getFailer()
      Retrieves failer.
      void setFailer(IFailer failer)
      Sets the failer.

    • Method Detail

      • getFailer

        IFailer getFailer()
        Retrieves failer. Call methods of this to throw an exception when a check asserts.
        Returns:
        failer.

      • setFailer

        void setFailer(IFailer failer)
        Sets the failer. Call methods of this to throw an exception when a check asserts.
        Parameters:
        failer - failer to use.
